entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:03 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 7:03 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
